item.title: IT Service Management - A Data Science Use Case
item.description: Web Application Github Repository Project Background IT Service Management (ITSM) is an important corporate function responsible for leveraging innovation to increase value, maximizing user productivity, providing end-to-end tech services, and so much more. IT departments are facing the business issue of dealing with helpdesk incidents that are (a) incorrectly assigned (b) out of the scope of what the corresponding team should be responsible for. This leads to an inefficient allocation of department resources the misalignment of team goals, responsibilities, and accountability.

item.title: Natural Language Processing of Consumer Reviews - Won Best Undergraduate Project
item.description: Github Link Project Background Consumers discuss their experiences and opinions through their Yelp reviews, thus natural language processing and sentiment analysis can be utilized. Overall, sentiment analysis can help understand consumers as a whole by detecting businessâ€™ day-to-day successes and faults, and remedying them over time. The challenges we aim to solve: What areas of the restaurant business needs to be fixed during Covid? What areas of the restaurant business should be capitalized on?
